title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. C, art. 1, pt. 405 - Purchase of Services by Social Services District
content:

State Regulations

§ 405.2 - Authorization
§ 405.3 - Contract requirements
§ 405.4 - Procedures for implementation
§ 405.5 - Renumbered

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. C, art. 1, pt. 405

Amended

New

York State Register June 3, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 22, eff. 6/3/2020

Statutory authority: Social Services Law, §§ 20[2][b], [3][d], 20-c, 34[3][f], 358, 390, 410, 410-x; L. 1997, ch. 436

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
